name: LYRIC (Lavender Youth Recreation & Information Center)
description: Free education, job training, health services, and housing help for LGBTQ+ youth
fullDescription: LYRIC provides education, career training, health services, housing navigation, and leadership development for LGBTQQ+ youth ages 12-24 in San Francisco.
whatTheyOffer:
- Education enhancement programs
- Career training and job placement
- Health promotion and PrEP/HIV care
- Housing navigation assistance
- Leadership development
- Drop-in youth services
- Mental health support
howToGetIt:
1. Visit LYRIC during drop-in hours
2. Must be ages 12-24
3. LGBTQQ+ youth and allies welcome
4. Register for specific programs
5. Walk-in services available
